Date: 2025-03-14 15:47
Subject: Introducing Yeda, Creating Impact, The Abaya Lab Staff Sale, Tory Burch Ramadan Collection, Weekly Internal Opportunities
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-7-min.png> 	

Introducing YEDA – our Group’s new fragrance brand


 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=459&user=10620> 	

More than just a fragrance brand, YEDA is a tribute to the rich, timeless traditions of Khaleeji culture—celebrating the region’s artistic talent and the deep connection between people and places. 


The brand is available at Tryano, Tanagra and Faces stores in the UAE, with more doors to come. 

Read more here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=459&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-6-min.png> 	

Creating Impact this Ramadan

chunks.text:
Read more here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=459&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-6-min.png> 	

Creating Impact this Ramadan

This year, we have once again committed to delivering 1 Million Ramadan Meals to support underprivileged communities. To achieve this goal, we have partnered with UAE Food Bank, which operates under the Mohammed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum Global Initiatives (MBRGI). Read more  <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=460&user=10620> 
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=460&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=461&user=10620> 	
On Day 2 of our Ramadan Kit Distribution at a labour camp in Al Quoz in Dubai, 27 amazing volunteers came together to distribute 500 kits in just one hour through the 1 Million Meals initiative in partnership with UAE Food Bank, ensuring that those in need receive the support they deserve during this blessed month.
Our team in Egypt partnered with the  Egyptian Food Bank to pack 400 Ramadan Boxes, providing 30,000 meals for families in need. Each box we packed represents not just food, but also love and solidarity with our community.
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=462&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-1-min.png> 	

The Abaya Lab Staff Sale

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/67d3fb2a0d4b9424807701.jpeg>

This year, we have once again committed to delivering 1 Million Ramadan Meals to support underprivileged communities. To achieve this goal, we have partnered with UAE Food Bank, which operates under the Mohammed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum Global Initiatives (MBRGI). Read more  <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=460&user=10620>

On Day 2 of our Ramadan Kit Distribution at a labour camp in Al Quoz in Dubai, 27 amazing volunteers came together to distribute 500 kits in just one hour through the 1 Million Meals initiative in partnership with UAE Food Bank, ensuring that those in need receive the support they deserve during this blessed month.
Our team in Egypt partnered with the  Egyptian Food Bank to pack 400 Ramadan Boxes, providing 30,000 meals for families in need. Each box we packed represents not just food, but also love and solidarity with our community.
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=462&user=10620>

The Abaya Lab Staff Sale

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/67d3fb2a0d4b9424807701.jpeg> 	

Stunning abayas at exclusive staff prices—just in time for Ramadan! Happening at The Greenhouse on Monday, 17th from 11 AM - 4 PM! Don’t miss out on this limited-time sale.

Stunning abayas at exclusive staff prices—just in time for Ramadan! Happening at The Greenhouse on Monday, 17th from 11 AM - 4 PM! Don’t miss out on this limited-time sale. 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-3-min.png> 	

Tory Burch Ramadan Capsule collection

Tory Burch unveils an exclusive Ramadan capsule collection inspired by the elegance of Middle Eastern women and the luminous spirit of the season. Featuring metallic Eleanor Mini Satchels, stunning jewelry, chic slingbacks, and silk separates - shirt, pants and caftan done in the brand's signature T-Monogram, the collection is perfect for iftar and suhoor gatherings. The exclusive capsule collection is available in stores and online.

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=463&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/05-2-min.png> 	

Weekly Internal Opportunities

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=464&user=10620> 	

Visit our Chalhoub Career Site <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=464&user=10620>  for all our vacancies and use your Chalhoub email address to be recognized as Internal! Here are our top jobs for this week:
